subsection.text: Natural Explorer applies to all wilderness terrains, but no longer has the text "Your group can't become lost except by magical means"
Favored Enemy additionally adds damage equal to half your proficiency rounded up to chosen enemies
Beast Bond allows the Ranger to command his beast as a free action. Instead of granting advantage when it is within 5 feet, it gains +1d6 damage and your concentration cannot be broken
Add Find Familiar, Find Steed, and Find Greater Steed to the rangers spell list.
When wildshaped, instead of gaining the beasts life, gain wildshape hp (works like but stacks with temporary hp) equal to the beasts hp. Status effects carry over when transforming or reverting.
Until level 5, wildshape hp from beasts is halved, and they do not gain extra attack feature
Add Find Familiar, Find Steed, and Find Greater Steed to the druids spell list

Four Elements Monks learn Absorb Elements (2 Ki Points) and one of the following Cantrips: Gust, Shape Water, Control Flames, Mold Earth. In addition, they can learn additional arcane spell like abilities, with DM discretion, as long as they fit the theme of four elements.
Warlock uses intelligence instead of charisma for class features, you gain intelligence saving throws instead of charisma.
Hex Warrior feature is moved to Pact of the Blade
When multiclassing with Warlock, use the Warlock spell table as the multiclass spell slot table

Sorcerers add their proficiency bonus to their maximum sorcerer points. At level 10, they add double their proficiency bonus. When taking a long rest, select one cantrip. The spells you focus on cost 1 less sorcery point when adding metamagic.
